column4: how do I find out where a program is installed to?  I'm trying to find out where scite is installed so i can get at the configuration files (there is no .sc<auto complete> in my home/user/ directory)
You can make one, that'll be your user profile.  ~/.SciTEUser.properties
http://www.scintilla.org/SciTEDoc.html#PropertiesFile for how the four possible properties files interact.
